game_description: Inner Focus® offers a new way to support wellness. Through an interactive series of steps, you are guided into a relaxed state that improves focus and reduces stress or anxiety. Against a backdrop of scenes from nature, each phase is designed to deepen the user’s sense of peace. — FLOW lets the emotions out through actions assembling mandala puzzles. — FOCUS is less active. Focus on the circle with your gaze and breathe consciously — REFLECT is listening. Focus on the sounds around you and the feelings inside you. By tracking movements, Inner Focus measures how focused you are during each phase, which contributes to a “score” at the end of the experience, with tips to help improved performance. Support your wellness in VR: • Discover over 15 mandalas of different shape and difficulty • Customize breath patterns and session duration • Get personalized tips with a smart tracking system • See historical statistics • Enjoy your state in a world created with love and care.
review_1: Given the amount of hustle and stress in this World, it is great to be able to use VR as an effective tool for meditation, relaxation, and focus. Inner Focus uses the senses to create a relaxing environment with sight , binaural audio, and guided voiceover, to help the user to attain a state of relaxation to improve their mood and improve positive energy.
